segments.text: I'm watching this scene, and a growing sense of frustration is building.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so utterly engrossed in her dish, it's unbelievable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice the literal flood at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry to see such a basic lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, those children are taking full advantage of her distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are openly raiding the cookie jar, right there in the open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of sneaking around is exactly why rules are important.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It just feels so disrespectful to the adult in charge, even if she's unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to be paying attention here, it's not a free-for-all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness is almost an invitation for mischief, and that irritates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the audacity of the children, and the blindness of the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scenario just feels like a breakdown of order.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s going to end in a bigger mess and possibly tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't people just be more mindful of their surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really find this situation quite provoking.
segments.speaker: PAR
